content: आयतनं [आयतंतेऽत्र, यत् आधारे ल्युट्] {@--1@} Place, abode, house, resting-place; (<ab>fig.</ab> also); शूलायतनाः <ls>Mu. 7</ls> hangmen; स्नेहस्तदेकायतनं जगाम <ls>Ku. 7. 5</ls> was centred in her; <ls>R. 3. 36</ls>; सर्वाविनयानामेकैकमप्येषामायतनं <ls>K. 103</ls>; °मृगेण <ls n="K.">130</ls> domestic deer; <ls>Chāṇ. 32</ls>; (hence) a receptacle, home, support, seat. {@--2@} The place of the sacred fire, altar, shed for sacrifices. {@--3@} A sanctuary, sacred place; as in देवायतनं, मठायतनं &c. {@--4@} The site of a house, groundplot. {@--5@} A barn. {@--6@} An inner seat (with Buddhists who consider the five senses with {%manas%} as the six Āyatanas). {@--7@} The cause of disease.
